ul.li: Deal 1 irreducible melee damage to a target.
One player may search their trash for an Equipment card and put it in their hand.

card.name: Original Halberd
card.text: When activated, Armsmaster deals 2 melee damage to a target. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

card.name: Survey Halberd
card.text: When activated, draw a card. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

card.name: Experimental Halberd
card.text: When activated, Armsmaster deals 1 irreducible energy damage to a target. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

card.name: Grapple Halberd
card.text: When activated, destroy an environment card. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

card.name: Return in a Flash
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck or your trash until you reveal a Halberd. Either put it into play or into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle the other revealed cards back into your deck

card.name: Equipment Stash
card.text: Search your deck for an Equipment card and either put it into play or into your hand. Shuffle your deck

card.name: Safeties
card.text: Whenever one of your equipment cards would be destroyed, you may destroy this card instead

card.name: Flamethrower
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Deal 2 fire damage to a non-hero target.
Secondary: Destroy an environment card

card.name: Combat Prediction Array
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Reveal the top 3 cards of the villain deck, and put them back in any order.
Secondary: Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to Armsmaster by villain cards by 1

card.name: Recycler
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Draw a card.
Secondary: Activate the secondary text of the card to the left of the Halberd this card is next to

card.name: Medicator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: All hero targets regain 1 HP.
Secondary: Armsmaster regains 2 HP

card.name: Grappling Hook
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Deal 1 projectile damage to up to 2 non-hero targets.
Secondary: Destroy an Ongoing card

card.name: Accelerator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: All heroes may draw a card.
Secondary: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card

card.name: Stasis Effector
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Discard 2 cards. If you do, the next time a villain card would be played, put it in the villain trash instead, and until the start of your next turn all villain character cards are immune to damage
Secondary: Destroy a target with 4 HP or less

card.name: Targeting Computer
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Select a hero target. The next time that hero target deals damage, increase the damage by 1 and make the damage irreducible.
Secondary: Choose a target. At the start of your next turn, you deal that target 4 projectile damage

card.name: Static Field Generator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Deal 2 lightning damage to a target
Secondary: Deal 1 lightning damage to all targets with 2 or less HP

card.name: Communicator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: A hero other than Armsmaster may use a power
Secondary: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card
